component.name: TCPU
component.version: CMO内部使用，商用发布不用关注，设备不会显示

features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新优化部分场景上网体验，修复电池图标显示异常和系统与部分游戏类应用的兼容性问题，提升系统稳定性，合入安全补丁，推荐您进行更新。
• 优化部分场景上网体验。
• 修复系统与部分游戏类应用的兼容性问题。
• 修复低电量场景下，状态栏电池图标显示异常问题。
• 提升系统稳定性，让您的手机运行更稳定。
• 合入安卓2024年11月安全补丁，增强系统安全性。有关荣耀软件安全更新内容的信息，请访问荣耀官方网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/support/bulletin/2024/11
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份。 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用。 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持。

Dear user, this update enhances the network performance in some scenarios, and resolves the display issue of the battery icon. Additionally, this update fixes compatibility issues with the system and some gaming apps. This release also improves the system stability, and incorporates a security patch. It is recommended to update.
• Enhances the network performance in some scenarios.
• Fixes compatibility issues with the system and some gaming apps.
• Resolves the display issue of the battery icon in the status bar in low battery scenarios.
• Improves the system stability to make your device run more stably.

• Android Security Patch (Nov 2024) has been incorporated for the system security. For more information about HONOR Security updates, please visit our website https://www.honor.com/global/support/bulletin/2024/11

1. Installing this update will not affect your personal data, but it is still recommended to back up your data before updating. 2. Check out more information on product features in the Tips app. 3. If you encounter any problem during use, please get support by going to My HONOR or visiting our website: https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us.
